Career Center


Division of Student Affairs











 

Career Center


Division of Student Affairs



















Home






We are Ready to Help You Succeed!
Whether you are looking for an on-campus job, a summer internship, or your post-grad career we are here to support you and set you up for success. If you are just starting your college experience or it is coming to a close it is important to always have your future in mind. The Career Center is a hub of knowledge and support for all students. No matter where you are on your career journey the Career Center is ready to support you and see you join SSU’s network of successful professionals. Visit the Career Center and meet one on one with one of our career advisors.

Finding Jobs & Internships





Finding a job, internship or volunteer opportunity can be challenging, but we have you covered! Our team is here to assist in finding specific jobs, internships, and service interests. Handshake is SSU's job search board where students can apply to hundreds of full-time and part-time jobs, volunteer positions, and internship opportunities!




Resources





Not sure where to start? We have tools like Focus2Career to help you get the right start with career exploration. We also have resources for you including how to write a resume and cover letter, find a job or a mentor, how to ace your interview, and get ready to apply to graduate school!




Programs & Events





Don’t miss out on our programs and live events to get you ready and prepared for your future. Meet employers on campus or virtually and start networking your way to your first job after graduation.




Career Advising





If you aren’t sure where to start, need some extra help, set up a time to meet with our career advisors. They can steer you in the right direction, help you set up clear goals, explore our resources and tools, and generally support you on your career development journey. Let us help you take the first step!
Current students, grad students, and recent alumni: Please email careercenter@sonoma.edu to schedule an appointment. 
*Appointments are being held via Zoom. For more information about using Zoom, please visit SSU's Zoom homepage.

Thank You to Our Premium Sponsors















    Where Seawolves Work  



Our Seawolf family can be found all around the world! Alumni of SSU work at some of the top companies in the world, such as Google, Facebook, Deloitte and Kaiser. Use the LinkedIn Alumni search tool to find a Seawolf at a company of your interest. Search for "Sonoma State University" on LinkedIn to go to their page. Once there, click "See Alumni", right near the top. You can then search by region, company, job title, skills, and interests. This is a great way to connect to alums for informational interviews, internships, or potential future jobs.
